embeddedItem.name: Artifex's Gyreheart
embeddedItem.desc: Components used in Xianzhou's ingenium creations. Advanced material used for enhancement.
embeddedItem.lore:
The core of Xianzhou's ingenium technology. The armillary sphere roils and vibrates like the essence of a heart, making the machine think like a living being.

"Do not be startled. Taking away its heart would make him... her?... No, make it lose its sentience and return to its mechanical sources."
comeFrom: Entranced Ingenia at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

48073.name: Sushang
48073.lore:
Born on the Xianzhou Yaoqing, sent to the Cloud Knights of the Luofu for military training.
She wields her family sword, a gift from her mother, and longs for the future she will go on to write.

79837.name: Echoes of the Coffin
79837.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Abundance. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
79837.lore:
Under the watch of the white irises, he knocks on the coffin.
"Sometimes I feel I underestimated you by proposing this deal."
He receives no response other than a thorny branch piercing through his palm.
Yet he smiles, and tightly grasps the thorn.

"Indeed. This is how it is. We wanted to use each other, and both ended up underestimating the other."

332600.name: Luocha
332600.lore:
Carrying a coffin wherever he goes, he is a foreign trader who came from beyond the stellar seas.
Has excellent medical skills.

633444.name: Artifex's Cogwheel
633444.desc: Parts of the Xianzhou machines. Normal material used for enhancement.
633444.lore:
The connective components used in Xianzhou's ingenium technology. The intricate and thin teeth of the cogwheels are as minute as mustard seeds, and yet are interconnected to form a complex body, making the machine able to pass as true life.

"Its form lies in harmony, a parallel to nature. Its movements cyclical, echoing the cosmos."
comeFrom: Entranced Ingenia at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

676275.name: Hidden Shadow
676275.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Nihility. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
676275.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"The Nihility might find us, but there is a non-zero chance that they might not."

717289.name: Silvermane Medal
717289.desc: Medal of honor worn by soldiers of the Silvermane Guards with gallant and meritorious service. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717289.lore:
A proof of honor awarded to those that fought against Fragmentum creatures, Underworlders, and sudden disasters.
It is not usually pinned onto the recipient's chest, but rather placed onto his coffin.

"Remember, young Gepard. It is not a toy: it is the destiny and blood of the Landau family."
comeFrom: Everwinter Shadewalker and Incineration Shadewalker at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Silvermane Guards and vagrants at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

717290.name: Ancient Engine
717290.desc: Mechanical engine left behind from the Old World. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717290.lore:
It uses Geomarrow as the energy source. When powered, it spews wandering auroras, not sparkles.

"Only the Technology Division directly under the Supreme Guardian has access to information regarding the Old World. I lost my privileges after I was fired."
comeFrom: Automatons at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

717319.name: Conqueror's Will
717319.desc: Condensed anti-matter. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717319.lore:
Highly condensed anti-matter within the body of the Voidranger: Trampler. The moment of obliteration is the trumpet call for civilizations' destruction.

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."
comeFrom: Antimatter Legion at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

717320.name: Squirming Core
717320.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717320.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
The heart is pulsating slowly, with a residual force powerful enough to cause a new calamity. It's best to destroy it to prevent further troubles.

"It's like a cancer..."
comeFrom: Certain Fragmentum Monsters at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

717386.name: Immortal Lumintwig
717386.desc: Deciduous twigs from an ancient divine construct. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717386.lore:
The source of the Xianzhou long-life species' "Endless Lifespan." The remnants of the Aeon of Abundance's influence. After the Three Sufferings, Xianzhou laid in devastation. The Homo celestinae fell as demons, and catastrophes occurred ceaselessly.

"As decreed by the Ten-Lords Commission, all who are near the mara-struck state will be seized by the infernal judges and cast into the Shackling Prison."
comeFrom: Abominations of Abundance at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

754820.name: Shared Feeling
754820.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Abundance. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
754820.lore:
When the doctor found the wounded girl, she was clinging to a machine that had stopped working, with all sorts of parts filling her pocket.
She took the girl back to her clinic and treated the wounds.
Drops of sweat slowly rolled down the girl's cheek, but she remained silent and her hands didn't stop fiddling the machine.
To the doctor, the way the girl was attached to the machine was very much like how she was attached to her patients who needed help.
So the doctor did not try to comfort the girl nor did she nag her about being more careful; but rather, she sat down with her to give her a moment of peace.

838761.name: Subscribe for More!
838761.desc: Light Cone for the Path of The Hunt. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
838761.lore:
"Yo, yo. What is up! Is everything coming through?"

The orange-haired girl slowly lifts a sledgehammer while shouting enthusiastically at the camera.
"Ever seen a pretty girl doing the cinder-block-smashed-on-chest stunt?"

"I didn't sign up for this!"
The brunette girl cried out loud, only to be met with a sly smile from the girl with the orange hair.
"Please. Just let me do this. This is what people would've wanted."

838763.name: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat
838763.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Nihility. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
838763.lore:
The limelight cast on the boxing ring is bright, but no brighter than all those beads of sweat running down his back.

He has long been determined to use his two fists to protect those he cherishes the most.
After all, they are the ones who ignited his determination in the first place.
They are the ones who have always been there for him, be it inside or outside the boxing ring.

838764.name: Perfect Timing
838764.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Abundance. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
838764.lore:
On a bustling street, he walks and walks. The sunlight closely follows his footsteps.
He makes a stop and picks up an umbrella to shade himself from the sun
...and from that prying gaze.

838776.name: Dance! Dance! Dance!
838776.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Harmony. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
838776.lore:
"Why couldn't Hook do a spinning dance move, just like how Clara does?"
She clenched her tiny fists and pouted her cute lips, her chubby little face looking redder than ever under her signature felt hat.
"Please, Mr. Svarog, can you please help Hook with this?"
Without saying any words, Mr. Svarog began to hold out his robotic arm.

"I'm g—gonna be sick!!! Put me down now! Please!"

931428.name: Yukong
931428.lore:
Head of the Sky-Faring Commission on the Xianzhou Luofu. Yukong was a seasoned pilot and a deadshot.
Since heading up the commission, she's been buried under mountains of paperwork.
